rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hiyokkoo doesn't want to salvage... mo.
I'm still a beginner no matter how much time passes,
and it's not fun at all... mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You think so?
If you find something good,
you get money, right?

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0003
rows.name:
And if you find a treasure you've never seen before,
don't you get curious about its origins?

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Sometimes you get chased by scary monsters,
but I think the excitement is stronger...

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0005
rows.name:
For me, the fear is stronger, mo...
Do you know the annual death toll for salvagers,
mo?

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Let's see...
About twenty people, maybe?

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0007
rows.name:
It's 360 people a year, mo!
That's almost the same number of Nopon
who die from eating poisonous mushrooms, mo!

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0008
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Maybe we should be dealing with the
poisonous mushrooms first...

rows.label: tlk42410111_01_msg0009
rows.name:
Ah...
I want to quit this dangerous job soon... mo.
